name: One Week at Fredbear's 2: The Final Go
name_original: One Week at Fredbear's 2: The Final Go
description:
The Year Is 1989. And You're name is John Stillwater, and you just got a job at the closed Fredbear's Family Diner. Its You're Job To gaurd The place At night.

[NOTE]: this game will most likely be VERY buggy, if you spot a big glitch, try to restart the game BEFORE you post a comment! (BTW Do NOT Let the toxicity meter hit 100 while wearing the Fredbear mask. If you let it go over 100 the game will bug out)

you are the night guard at Fredbear's Family Dinner and you start at 12 am and stay until 6 am. the nights get harder and harder as you progress so be prepared.

A code will be displayed at the bottom of the screen at the main menu 

press space for mask

don't let the counters reach 100  they count up as you use what it is for
